name: Pinball Arcade (itch)
description:
Pinball Arcade.

Do you like pinball and do you like it in Arcade style?
Well, this game is then for you. we got arcade cabinet, multi-ball cabinet, and even an arcade temple.
Try to aim for the biggest high score and remember don't lose the ball. 

this game is played with the keyboard

Z and ( . ) for moving the flippers. 
space and hold to launch the ball
X and (,) to tilt.
